name: Magic Mirror
skill: Increases DMG taken by current target by 51%/65% for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a mirror that speaks only the truth. As rumors of her abilities spread, many came to ask her questions day and night. After answering thousands of questions a day, she finally got sick of it and turned lazy. If you depend on her too much, she'll use your weak points against you. She is obedient only to the witch.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Clear Chapter 2.
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Exchange for 200 Hishi Mochi.
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 6001-10000.
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 7501-10000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Hishi Mochi during the "The Spirits' Doll Festival" event.

main: "Is there anything you'd like to know?"
skill: "Hurry up and kick the bucket, already."
limit_break: "I'll tell you anything you want to know... for now."
